title: Boosting on farm nitrogen fixation in pulses  Liz Farquharson

subtasks: Conducting GRDC project on nitrogen fixation
Investigating agronomy and inoculation practices for pulses
Studying group EF pulses (fava beans, lentils, field peas, vetch)
Including chickpeas and lupins in the study
Managing trial sites in South Australia (Port Broughton, Hart, Loxton) and Victoria (Neal)
Observing chickpea trial at Port Broughton
Comparing chickpea and lentil nodulation
Promoting regular nodulation checks by growers
Recommending inoculation for chickpeas unless well established
Exploring alternative inoculation techniques
Ensuring proper application of inoculum
Monitoring nodulation development
Adapting inoculation strategies for different crops MAINTASK: Extension resources
Distributing information through GRDC website
Educating growers on nodulation assessment
Highlighting the importance of informed inoculation decisions
Promoting sustainable pulse crop management
